languages.text:
The wearer gains the {g|f:48139b5d8510426fa2d07a55f99236f5}In My Sights{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and provides:
-<indent=5%>Additional {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} equal to the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Additional {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} equal to the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}.</indent>
The wearer also gains Aeldari Weapon Proficiency.

traits.locale_text: The wearer gains the In My Sights {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and provides: -additional {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} equal to the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} -additional {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} equal to the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}. The wearer also gains Aeldari Weapon Proficiency.

The wearer gains the In My Sights {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and provides: -Additional {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} equal to the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}. -Additional {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} equal to the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}. The wearer also gains Aeldari Weapon Proficiency.

The wearer gains the In My Sights {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and provides: -Additional {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} equal to the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}. -Additional {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} equal to the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}. The wearer also gains Aeldari Weapon Proficiency.

languages.text:
装备者获得{g|f:48139b5d8510426fa2d07a55f99236f5}如我所见{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}。此能力不消耗任何{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}，会带来以下效果：
- <indent=5%>提高{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}，等同于装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}。</indent>
- <indent=5%>提高{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}闪避减免{/g}，等同于装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}。</indent>
装备者还会获得“艾达灵族武器专精”这一特性。
languages.original_text:
The wearer gains the {g|f:48139b5d8510426fa2d07a55f99236f5}In My Sights{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and provides:
-<indent=5%>Additional {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} equal to the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Additional {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} equal to the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}.</indent>
The wearer also gains Aeldari Weapon Proficiency.

traits.locale_text: 装备者获得如我所见{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}。此能力不消耗任何{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}，会带来以下效果： - 提高{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}，等同于装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}。 - 提高{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}闪避减免{/g}，等同于装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}。 装备者还会获得“艾达灵族武器专精”这一特性。

languages.text: Персонаж получает {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} Неотвратимый взгляд, не требующую затрат {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}, которая предоставляет: -Дополнительное {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитие брони{/g}, равное {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятию{/g} персонажа. -Дополнительное {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}снижение уклонения{/g}, равное {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнему Бою{/g} персонажа. Также персонаж автоматически осваивает обращение с эльдарским оружием.
languages.original_text: The wearer gains the In My Sights {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and provides: -Additional {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} equal to the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}. -Additional {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} equal to the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}. The wearer also gains Aeldari Weapon Proficiency.

traits.locale_text: Персонаж получает {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} Неотвратимый взгляд, не требующую затрат {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}, которая предоставляет: -дополнительное {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитие брони{/g}, равное {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятию{/g} персонажа -дополнительное {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}снижение уклонения{/g}, равное {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнему Бою{/g} персонажа. Также персонаж автоматически осваивает обращение с эльдарским оружием.

Персонаж получает {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} Неотвратимый взгляд, не требующую затрат {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}, которая предоставляет: -дополнительное {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитие брони{/g}, равное {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятию{/g} персонажа -дополнительное {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}снижение уклонения{/g}, равное {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнему Бою{/g} персонажа. Также персонаж автоматически осваивает обращение с эльдарским оружием.

languages.text: 使用者は{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}消費が0の視界の中{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を獲得し、 -使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}認知力{/g}と同等の{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}を追加で獲得する。 -使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弾道技能{/g}と同等の{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}回避減少{/g}を追加で獲得する。 さらに使用者はアエルダリ武器の達人を獲得する。
languages.original_text: The wearer gains the In My Sights {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and provides: -Additional {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} equal to the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}. -Additional {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} equal to the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}. The wearer also gains Aeldari Weapon Proficiency.

traits.locale_text: 使用者は{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}の消費が0の視界の中{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を獲得し、 -使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}認知力{/g}と同等の{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}を追加で獲得する。 -使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弾道スキル{/g}と同等の{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}回避減少{/g}を追加で獲得する。 さらに使用者はアエルダリ武器の達人を獲得する。

languages.text:
El portador obtiene la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} {g|f:48139b5d8510426fa2d07a55f99236f5}En la mira{/g}, que le cuesta 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} y le otorga:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g} adicional igual a la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g} del portador.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}reducción de esquiva{/g} igual a la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g} del portador.</indent>
El portador también consigue la competencia con armas Aeldari.
languages.original_text:
The wearer gains the {g|f:48139b5d8510426fa2d07a55f99236f5}In My Sights{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and provides:
-<indent=5%>Additional {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} equal to the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Additional {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} equal to the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}.</indent>
The wearer also gains Aeldari Weapon Proficiency.

traits.locale_text: El portador obtiene la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} En la mira, que le cuesta 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} y le otorga: -{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g} adicional igual a la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g} del portador -{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}reducción de esquiva{/g} igual a la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g} del portador. El portador también consigue la competencia con armas Aeldari.

languages.text:
Der Träger erhält die {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} {g|f:48139b5d8510426fa2d07a55f99236f5}In meinen Augen{/g}, die 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} kostet und Folgendes gewährt:
-<indent=5%>Zusätzliche {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g} entsprechend der {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g} des Trägers.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Zusätzliche {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}Ausweichen-Reduktion{/g} entsprechend der {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fähigkeit{/g} des Trägers.</indent>
Der Träger erhält außerdem Aeldari-Waffen-Fertigkeit.
languages.original_text:

-<indent=5%>Additional {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} equal to the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Additional {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} equal to the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}.</indent>
The wearer also gains Aeldari Weapon Proficiency.

traits.locale_text: Der Träger erhält die {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} In meinen Augen, die 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} kostet und Folgendes gewährt: -zusätzliche {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g} entsprechend der {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g} des Trägers -zusätzliche {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}Ausweichen-Reduktion{/g} entsprechend der {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fähigkeit{/g} des Trägers. Der Träger erhält außerdem Aeldari-Waffenfertigkeit.

languages.text:
L'utilisateur obtient la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} {g|f:48139b5d8510426fa2d07a55f99236f5}Dans ma ligne de mire{/g} pour 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} et confère :
-<indent=5%>Une {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g} supplémentaire égale à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} de l'utilisateur.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Une {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}réduction d'esquive{/g} supplémentaire égale à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de tir{/g} de l'utilisateur.</indent>
L'utilisateur acquiert également la Maîtrise des armes aeldaris.
languages.original_text:
The wearer gains the {g|f:48139b5d8510426fa2d07a55f99236f5}In My Sights{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and provides:
-<indent=5%>Additional {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} equal to the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Additional {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} equal to the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}.</indent>
The wearer also gains Aeldari Weapon Proficiency.

traits.locale_text: L'utilisateur obtient la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} Dans Ma Ligne de Mire pour 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} et confère : - Une valeur de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g} supplémentaire égale à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} de l'utilisateur. - Une valeur de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}réduction d'esquive{/g} supplémentaire égale à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Compétence Balistique{/g} de l'utilisateur. L'utilisateur acquiert également la Maîtrise des Armes Aeldari.

L'utilisateur obtient la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} Dans ma ligne de mire pour 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} et confère : -Une {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g} supplémentaire égale à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} de l'utilisateur. -Une {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}réduction d'esquive{/g} supplémentaire égale à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de tir{/g} de l'utilisateur. L'utilisateur acquiert également la Maîtrise des armes aeldaris.

languages.text:
Takan kişi, 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} bedelli ve şu özelliklere sahip {g|f:48139b5d8510426fa2d07a55f99236f5}Gözüm Üstünde{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyeti{/g} kazanır.
-<indent=5%>Takan kişinin {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Algı{/g} niteliği kadar ilave {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}zırh delme{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Takan kişinin {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Balistik Yetenek{/g} niteliği kadar ilave {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}kaçınma azaltımı{/g}.</indent>
Takan kişi ayrıca Aeldari Silahı Yetkinliği de kazanır.
languages.original_text:

-<indent=5%>Additional {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} equal to the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Additional {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} equal to the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}.</indent>
The wearer also gains Aeldari Weapon Proficiency.
